attributes.action: Millie's Trust Raising Awareness in Paediatric First Aid
attributes.additional_details:
Currently no first aid training is given to parents when they have a baby, this is not provided by the government.

We were taught how to feed, how to sterilise, how to help babies to sleep and baby massage, yet one of the most important things in life, First Aid is continually missed off this training, we want this to change.

There are no free classes for parents or carers at any stage of your child's life and we think that this is wrong.

Ignorance of First Aid in the UK is unbelievable, yet Paediatric First Aid could one day save your child's

The pink giraffe's will march to government.
